sentence.text: Mutations in components of the major spliceosome have been described in disorders with craniofacial anomalies, e.g., Nager syndrome and mandibulofacial dysostosis cardiac muscle tissue development Guion-Almeida.

This rare condition is characterized by bilateral choanal atresia, hearing loss, cleft nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay and/or palate, and other craniofacial dysmorphisms.

entity.text: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay
